title: Biokidney Donation Education for Hispanic Populations: Mobile-Based Interactive Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Providing culturally tailored content for Spanish-speaking learners, optimized for smartphone-centric accessibility

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain the basic procedures and medical safety of living kidney donation.
Learners will be able to identify at least three cultural/emotional barriers related to kidney donation.
Learners will be able to create a decision-making treemap for each stage of the donation process via a mobile platform.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
